id,

mapper.update:
update job_report
job_id = #{jobId},
create_user_id = #{createUserId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
user_id = #{userId},
note = #{note},
job_name = #{jobName},
company_name = #{companyName}
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select jr.* from job_report jr left join user u on jr.user_id = u.id where 1=1
and jr.id = #{id}
and jr.job_name like concat('%',#{jobName},'%')
and u.name like concat('%',#{userRealName},'%')
